slave
Class NXTRemoteControl

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      slave.NXTRemoteControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteCommands, java.lang.Runnable
public class NXTRemoteControl
extends java.lang.Thread
implements RemoteCommands

Enables remote control of a motor object using RS485.

Listens for commands sent on RS485 connection. When a new command is received it will be interpreted, and carried out. If data is to be sent back, it will send data back through the RS485 connection.

It will wait and automatically connect to the master brick over RS485.

A modified version from http://www.lejos.org/forum/viewtopic.php?f=7&t=2620

Author:
cs07cc4 (LeJOS forum username)

Method Detail

executeMotorCommand

protected void executeMotorCommand(int id,
                                   int command)
                            throws java.io.IOException
Executes motor commands. It will read the dis for a param if necessary. If a value is to be returned, it will return it via the dos

Parameters:
id - - id of the motor (1 -> MotorA, 2 -> MotorB, 3-> MotorC)
command - - command to be carried out as per RemoteCommands interface
Throws:
java.io.IOException

executeSensorCommand

protected void executeSensorCommand(int id,
                                    int command)
                             throws java.io.IOException
Executes Ultrasonic Poller sensor commands. It will read a param for the dis if necessary. If a return value is required, it will be sent via the dos.

Parameters:
id - - will always be four, used to differentiate from motors
command - - command to execute as per RemoteCommands interface
Throws:
java.io.IOException

Returns the RemoteUltrasonicPoller if id == 4

run

public void run()
Connects to the other NXT brick. It will then continually check the dis for any new commands, and call the necessary execute method
